body_html:
I just carefully review the script optimize_for_inference.py. It seems that there is no parameter for --training=False/True. I cann't see this parameter. only 4 parameters below:

--input=frozen_inception_graph.pb \
--output=optimized_inception_graph.pb \
--input_names=Mul \
--output_names=softmax

body:
I just carefully review the script **optimize_for_inference.py**. It seems that there is no parameter for  --training=False/True. I cann't see this parameter. only 4 parameters below:

--input=frozen_inception_graph.pb \ 
--output=optimized_inception_graph.pb \ 
--input_names=Mul \ 
--output_names=softmax
